item.title: Contacts
item.description: Hassina Bilheux - Instrument Scientist Expertise: HFIR and SNS imaging beam lines bilheuxhn@ornl.gov (865) 384 - 9630 Lou Santodonato - Instrument Scientist Expertise: HFIR imaging beam line santodonatol@ornl.gov (865) 719 - 0656 Jean Bilheux - Computer Scientist Expertise: Software bilheuxjm@ornl.gov (865) 406 - 1704 Yuxuan Zhang (Shawn) - Postdoctorate Expertise: Resonance Imaging zhangy6@ornl.gov Indu Dihman - Postdoctorate Expertise: Polarization Imaging dhimani@ornl.

item.title: Github Repositories
item.description: Our gloal is to only develop open source tools. You will find here a list of the major repositories hosting our programs jupyter notebooks used in the analysis of the data python_notebooks python library used for normalization neunorm Imaging Resonance python library imagingReso iBeatles for Bragg Edge fitting iBeatles set of jupyter widgets ipywe Root analysis library RootPlantProcessing
